name: UI/UX Masterclass
Course Description: Master the art of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design to create intuitive and user-friendly digital products.

Course Outline.a: Introduction to UI/UX design and its significance
Course Outline.b: Conducting user research and defining user personas
Course Outline.e: Visual design principles for UI elements

Content Preview: In this course, you will delve into the world of UI/UX design for digital products. You will learn the importance of understanding  users through user research and defining user personas. Additionally, you will explore wireframing and prototyping digital interfaces to ensure optimal user experiences. The course will cover designing responsive and mobile-friendly layouts, applying visual design principles to UI elements, and conducting usability testing to validate design decisions. Moreover, you will learn to iterate designs based on user feedback to create intuitive and user-friendly digital products.
